about_the_game: OUTCLAW is a third person action adventure about commanding minions. Solve puzzles and fight monsters alongside your underlings, discovering all the peculiar forms they can take. Explore a variety of wonderous worlds in this exciting adventure full of mischief, monsters, minions and mayhem!
detailed_description: OUTCLAW is a third person action adventure about commanding minions. Solve puzzles and fight monsters alongside your underlings, discovering all the peculiar forms they can take. Explore a variety of wonderous worlds in this exciting adventure full of mischief, monsters, minions and mayhem!
name: Outclaw Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTC 970 or AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: OUTCLAW is a third person action adventure about commanding minions. Solve puzzles and fight monsters alongside your underlings, discovering all the peculiar forms they can take. Explore a variety of wonderous worlds in this exciting adventure full of mischief, monsters, minions and mayhem!
